task.summary: Run command in terminal rails g socialization -s to generate like's model and like's migration Run command in terminal rails g migration add_likers_count_to_posts likers_count:integer to generate migration to add likers count in table posts Run command in terminal raka db:migrate to save change and update schema of data base. Add to post controller the function toggle_like and call this function with ajax
Run command in terminal rails g model Friendship user_id:integer friend_id:integer accepted:boolean to generate table many to many of user with user Resolved conflict with view
It added that users can delete their comments and publications.
Users can add and delete friends
